## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description         | Type     | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `diameter` | `diameter` | The spinner's size. | `number` | `24`    |
| `stroke`   | `stroke`   |                     | `number` | `2`     |
